compositeCheatsheet.name: Create an Qompass-supported Model with MARTE

taskGroup.name: Create your model
taskGroup.intro: Introduction This guide will walk you though the process of creating a MARTE model with "Qompass-support" and generate the code related to your model. You will create an empty model and build it gradually to finally generate the related code. If you need help at any step, click the (?) to the right. Let's get started!
